alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 10:26PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN WICOMICO AND DORCHESTER COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM EDT... At 1025 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Taylors Island to 12 miles south of Cambridge to 10 miles northwest of Deal Island. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. Locations impacted include... Cambridge, Hurlock, Federalsburg, Sharptown, Secretary, Vienna, University Of Maryland Center For Environmental Studies, East New Market, Mardela Springs, Church Creek, Brookview, Eldorado, Madison, Andrews, Hudson, Crocheron, Wingate, Lloyds, Taylors Island, and Woolford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
